title: Avada.Wordpress.Theme.v3.6.2-THEMEFOREST
description:
Name: Avada - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme
Type: Wordpress Theme
Version: 3.6.2
Updated: 8 October 14
Columns: 3
Compatible Browsers: IE8, IE9, IE10, IE11, Firefox, Safari, Opera, Chrome
Software Version: WordPress 4.0, 3.9, 3.8, 3.7, 3.6, 3.5, 3.4, 3.3, 3.2
Compatible With: WPML, BuddyPress 1.9.x, WooCommerce 2.1.x, bbPress 2.5.x, Gravity Forms, Easy Digital Downloads, Events Calendar PRO, Events Calendar
Layout: Responsive
Files Included: PHP Files, CSS Files, JS Files
Widget Ready: Yes

Avada is the ultimate multi-purpose WordPress theme. It is clean, super flexible, responsive, includes Fusion Page Builder and comes packed with powerful options!

This multi-purpose WordPress theme sets the new standard with endless possibilities,its the most easy-to use theme on the market! Avada is very intuitive to use and completely ready to operate out of the box. Built with HTML5 & CSS3, a lot of thought and care went into this theme making it a pleasure to use. 

Avada has a ton of incredible user reviews and lots of awesome features. The clean multi-purpose design can be used for any type of website; business, corporate, portfolio, blog, products, etc. Come join all these users and be a part of this awesome community! 

If you like it, please support the creators and buy it! This theme seriously Kick Ass!
